channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Gear S Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Gear S Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-25406|2024-08-03T20:03:05.581Z -- samsung%20mobile -- gear%20s%20plugin
item.description: Information exposure vulnerability in Gear S Plugin prior to version 2.2.05.20122441 allows unstrusted applications to access connected BT device information.
